text: labhavu taksanaddagiddare mattu prayanavu sulabhaddagiddare avaru khandita nim'ma jote baruttiddaru. Adare avara palige dariyu tumba uddavayitu. Idiga avaru allahana hesaralli ane haki ‘‘namage sadhyaviddiddare navu khandita nim'ma jote baruttiddevu’’ endu heluvaru, nijavagi avaru tam'mannu tave nasa madikolluttiddare. Avaru sullu heluvavarembudu allahanige tilidide
